name: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
description: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!

feature.one: Build powerful, fast, user-friendly and reactive web apps
feature.two: Provide amazing user experiences by leveraging the power of JavaScript with ease
feature.three: Learn all about React Hooks and React Components

name: Node.js, Express, MongoDB & More: The Complete Bootcamp 2022

feature.one: Master the entire modern back-end stack
feature.two: Build a complete, beautiful & real-world application
feature.three: Build a fast, scalable, feature-rich RESTful API

name: The Complete JavaScript Course 2022: From Zero to Expert!
description: The modern JavaScript course for everyone! Master JavaScript with projects, challenges and theory. Many courses in one!

feature.one: Become an advanced JavaScript developer from scratch
feature.two: Build 6 beautiful real-world projects for your portfolio
feature.three: Become job-ready by understanding how JavaScript really works

name: Advanced CSS and Sass: Flexbox, Grid, Animations and More!
description: The most advanced and modern CSS course on the internet: master flexbox, CSS Grid, responsive design, and so much more.

feature.one: Tons of modern CSS techniques to create stunning designs and effects
feature.two: Advanced CSS animations with @keyframes, animation and transition
feature.three: How CSS works behind the scenes: the cascade, specificity, inheritance, etc

name: Docker & Kubernetes: The Practical Guide [2022 Edition]
description: Learn Docker, Docker Compose, Multi-Container Projects, Deployment and all about Kubernetes from the ground up!

feature.one: Learn what Docker and Kubernetes are and why you might want to use them
feature.two: Learn how to install and use Docker on any system (macOS, Windows, Linux)
feature.three: Learn how to create and use Images & Containers with Docker

name: The Complete Financial Analyst Course 2022
description: Excel, Accounting, Financial Statement Analysis, Business Analysis, Financial Math, PowerPoint: Everything is Included!

feature.two: Format spreadsheets in a professional way
feature.three: Be much faster carrying out regular tasks

name: Unreal Engine 5 C++: Learn C++ & Make Video Games
description: Created in collaboration with Epic Games. Learn C++ from basics while making your first 5 video games in Unreal

feature.one: How to make games in Unreal Engine 5
feature.two: C++, the games industry standard language
feature.three: Object Oriented Programming and how to put it into practice.

name: The Complete Android 12 & Kotlin Development
description: Learn Android 12 App Development From Beginner to Advanced Developer. Build Apps like Trello, 7Min Workout, Weather App

feature.one: You can build any Android app you can think of.
feature.two: You will build Apps for your portfolio to apply for jr. Android developer Jobs.
feature.three: You'll be able to work as an Android freelancer and work from anywere in the world.

name: Advanced AI: Deep Reinforcement Learning in Python
description: The Complete Guide to Mastering Artificial Intelligence using Deep Learning and Neural Networks
